-ri#yAqd-yad-vA#yaqvya#H paqSurBava#tiq tEna# vAqyOrnaitiq yat prA#jApaqtyaH pu#rOqDASOq Bava#tiq tEna# prAqjApa#tEqrnaitiq yad dvAda#SakapAlaqstEna# vaiSvAnaqrAnnaityA$gnA vaiShNaqvamEkA#daSakapAlaqM nirva#pati dIkShiqShyamA#NOq&gniH sarvA# dEqvatAq viShNu#ryaqj~jO dEqvatA$Scaiqva yaqj~jaM cA&&* ra#BatEq&gnira#vaqmO 
dEqvatA#nAqM ~MviShNu#H paraqmO yadA$gnA-vaiShNaqva-mEkA#daSakapAlaM niqrvapati dEqvatA# - [  ] 4
